physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features nine males. Some of them are dressed in their military uniforms while others are in short sleeved shirts. Most of them are looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. There are numerous cups on the wooden table along with a couple of beer bottles. Some of the males are holding their cups and raising it in the air. All of them are sitting down except for one, who is standing up at the right hand side of the photograph.
title_text: Military Personnel Celebrating on New Year's Eve, 1946 Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: group portraits military personnel beer (beverage) anniversaries
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portraits, Group Portrait photography Soldiers Drinking of alcoholic beverages New Year
